/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11    CMakeFiles/visualizeGeometry.dir/visualizeGeometry.cpp.o  -o visualizeGeometry -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libpangolin.so -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lGLEW -lX11 -lpython2.7 -ldc1394 -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lOpenNI -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff -lIlmImf -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
